name: SparmZ - Quest for the Galaxy
description:
Controls 

W - Move up 

S - Move down 

A/S - Moves left and right using boosters(be careful! this uses fuel!) 

Escape - Return to main menu 

This game was created as part of a school project in Spring of 2018. 

Music by Hayley Curran 

https://twitter.com/AnothrOrchestra
